Compare Roller Blinds

Voile FR Sandshell Cream Roller Blind (Swift directblinds)

Their voile fr fabrics look beautiful up due to their translucent properties in a wide array of neutral shades. Durable and stylish, this translucent cream roller blind allows the light to filter through and is hand-washable. This cream roller blind is ideal for kitchens as it's flame-retardant. At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why your new voile roller blind is made by their expert team in their yorkshire workshop, and comes with customer-1st service! Product id: db-rbx2181 fabric colour: sandshell cream headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er1 - lowest energy saving value - due to blind type or fabric light filtering: yes Voile fr sandshell cream roller blind in cream. Made to measure from 9.20 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.

Voile FR Cobalt Blue Roller Blind (Swift directblinds)

Voile fr cobalt blue is a semi-translucent stylish, dark blue roller and is great for freshening up the look of any room. Their voile fabrics are a fabulous modern alternative to the traditional net curtain. A busy kitchen or living room will benefit from this delicate, translucent design in blue that will leave the space feeling open, light and airy. Flame retardant and pollergen-coated, makes this sheer roller blind a fantastic addition to your living space. At swift direct blinds, their customers and quality comes first, that's why we offer a five-year guarantee on their made-to-measure blinds. Based in west yorkshire, their roller blinds are carefully cut and assembled by their expert roller team. Not only are we situated in the heart of the yorkshire textile industry, but their own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country. This soft blue roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by their blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service. Stirlo Oyster Cream (Blinds By Post)

Stirlooyster cream plain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on their professional discretion. Made to measure stirlo oyster cream roller blind | privacy, dim-out fabric | blindsbypost

Stirlo Butter Cream (Blinds By Post)

Stirlo butter cream plain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on their professional discretion. Made to measure stirlo butter cream roller blind | privacy, dim-out fabric | blindsbypost

All control chains supplied with their roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. Their thermoblock range is made from blackout fabric, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control. This light grey blackout roller has a silver uv-reflecting backing, meaning your rooms are kept cool in summer and warm in winter, which means this roller is also great for hot offices or sunrooms. Roller blinds bring a contemporary and modern look to the space, and as all their blinds are child-safe, their roller blinds can be installed anywhere in the house! At swift direct blinds, we take quality seriously. Not only are we situated in the heart of the yorkshire textile industry, but their own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country. This grey roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by their blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service. Burst Soft Grey Roller Blind (Make My Blinds)

Off-white is one of those colour categories that we will always endorse as a choice for your blind, as it brings an elements of modest sophistication to almost any colour palette. Lacking the yellows of other more beige tones, it is much more suited to softening a primary colour but likewise is not out of place in a room filled with an earthier beat. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric. Just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. These blinds are moisture resistant too so can be installed in a kitchen or bathroom. Fed up of the sun spoiling your view of the telly? Install this dimout blind and stop the glare from ruinning your favourite show. All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.Makeitsafe.Org.Uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with their roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you. Burst soft grey roller blind. A wipe clean, dim out fabric perfect for any room in the house. Available in over 60 colours and patterns.

Konya Blackout Ink Blue (Blinds By Post)

Konya blackoutink blue plain roller blind the konya range boasts a huge range of blackout and thermal fabrics to use in any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester, with a pvc blackout backing and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If both the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on their professional discretion. Their screenview roller blinds, are a set of flame-retardant, dimout screen fabrics, made from a pvc/polyester fabric which are perfect for temperature control in offices and hot rooms. This black roller blind is perfect for blocking out the heat and harmful uv rays from your room, keeping the core room temperature down, a must for any modern environment. These magic screen blinds ensure you can still see outside but don't let anybody outside see in. Perfect for maintaining privacy if you live near a busy road/ street or have have a room that is over-looked by other properties. At swift direct blinds, with over 50 years experience, we take quality seriously. Their bespoke roller blinds are crafted by their team of experts, and not only comes with customer-first service and industry-leading quick delivery times, but also comes with a free five year guarantee! This means their customers can be sure that their products are made to last. Still not sure? Metz PVC Blackout Snow White Roller Blind (Swift directblinds)

This bright white, marbled, snow white blackout roller blind is also great at blocking out light, so is a great option for rooms where screens feature, such as living rooms or offices, and due to it's waterproof fabric, is also a smart option for bathrooms or kitchens. At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why your new roller blind is made by their expert team, in their yorkshire workshop, and comes with a free five year guarantee and customer-first aftercare. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.Makeitsafe.Org.Uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with their roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you. Amor campfire smoke roller blind. A 100% blackout fabric blind best suited for the bedroom. Glow In The Dark Blackout Roller Blind (Swift directblinds)

Glow, a special glow in the dark roller which lights up the room at night, perfect for a child's room. Perfect for your little one's bedroom, glow in the dark is a blackout grey-toned fabric which is a perfect way to bring the night sky inside. Leave the blind extended down with room lights on and door closed a minimum 30 minutes prior to lights out for the glow-in-the-dark effect to have maximum impact. This will last for around 30 minutes after lights out. Leafy Jungle Roller Blind (Make My Blinds)

Add some vibrancy to your windows with the leafy jungle roller blind. With it's green and grey colour scheme this blind packs a punch and is a great way of adding colour to your window. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 280cm wide - much wider than most paterned roller blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style. All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.Makeitsafe.Org.Uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with their roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you. Add some vibrancy to your windows with the leafy jungle roller blind. With it's green and grey colour scheme this blind packs a punch and is a great way of adding colour to your window.

Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 280cm wide - much wider than most paterned roller blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style. All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.Makeitsafe.Org.Uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with their roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.

Speciality Morning Flight (Make My Blinds)

Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 280cm wide - much wider than most paterned roller blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style. All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.Makeitsafe.Org.Uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with their roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.

Kerry Light Bark Roller Blind (Make My Blinds)

The kerry light bark is a soft brown, but darker than a taupe colour. This fabric is a blackout meaning it is perfect for bedrooms as it will stop all of the light from passing through the fabric. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material. All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.Makeitsafe.Org.Uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with their roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you. Kerry light bark roller blind. 100% blackout fabric, perfect for the bedroom. A wipe clean fabric helping your blinds look better for longer.

All control chains supplied with their roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you. Kerry raven roller blind. Their roller blinds go well over 3m and we offer: blackout, voile, waterproof and dimout fabrics. All made to measure for your windows.

This colour won't fade into the background and will be at the centre of attention in any room. Looking for something a little stronger? This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues. Ideal for installing in a bathroom or right next to the shower. Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material. All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.Makeitsafe.Org.Uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with their roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you. The rich pink colour in the gibson bubblegum is ideal for rooms that need some life in them! Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.Makeitsafe.Org.Uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with their roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. Gently filtering the light and preventing people from seeing in, this blind is ideal for those who don't want to be overlooked. The colour will not fade and being moisture resistant means it can be installed in bathrooms - guaranteed to add a splash of style! Looking for something a little stronger? This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues. Ideal for installing in a bathroom or right next to the shower. Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material. Piazza bolzano roller blind

Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material. All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.Makeitsafe.Org.Uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with their roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you. Linden sage green roller blind

Voile blinds, also known as sheer blinds, are a great way to give your home privacy whilst still letting the daylight in. The sheer fabric is thin and delicate and will give your room privacy from anyone looking in.

Made from wipeable pvc-coated fabric, this bright and cheery roller blind adds a splash of vitality and colour to your home. Available in a layer-loving roman blind or luscious curtain! At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why this roller blind comes with their free five year guarantee and customer-first service. Product id: db-rbx2130 fabric colour: greenhouse material: 100% cotton pvc coated headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes Pot plants pvc matte greenhouse roller blind in white/green/multicoloured. Baa Baa PVC Matte Duckegg Roller Blind (Swift directblinds)

Their baa baa range features cute sheep, with fashionable tartain, striped and checked coats, on a soft dandelion-dotted field. This duckegg baa-tastic design withits chic light blue colour palette and smiling cream sheep, is a nod to their farming and industrial history, and looks fantastic as a roller blind. Not only does this light-filtering fabric envoke feelings of softness with its design, its also made from pvc-coated material - making your new roller blind moisture-resistant, a must for kitchens, bathrooms or children's rooms. At swiftdirectblinds, with over fifty years experiance making blinds and curtains for uk homes, their high quality productsand customer-first service is important to us! Choices Allium Linen Papaya Roller Blind (blinds2go)

Strawberry thief is an iconic design that was first designed by william morris in 1883, and is still as charming now as it was then. Disney Princess Roller Blind (Make My Blinds)

Liven up your childs bedroom with one of their disney roller blinds, 100% blackout to help ensure a great nights sleep, and in a range of clasic prints that'll help make bedtime something to look forward to! As standard all of their blinds are child safe coming with a clear clip to hold the chain taught and agaisnt the wall so there are no free-hanging cords. Being a blackout fabric makes this blind perfect for bedrooms where you need darkness to help give your child the best night sleep possible. Disney princess roller blind

roller

Clear Transparent PVC COVID-19 Roller Blind (Blinds By Post)

This product is designed to protect both your customers and employees from the potential spread of covid-19. This fire retardent pvc transparent roller blind is perfect for use to segregate staff in retail environments, without losing light or visibility of your workplace. These blinds have been used above counter tops, between factory workers and too between retail workers (such as hairdressers and nail parlours). These see through roller blinds are essential in the above environments to protect the spread of aerosols from coughing, sneezing and day-to-day movements. We have designed this product so that the blinds can be installed directly onto any solid surface and also all suspended ceilings too! Hence they are perfect for office blocks too - they require a specific bracket which are available to purchase to fix onto the back bar of the roller blind which too ensures the weight of the product can be equally distributed along any fixing surface. We supply the blind on a rigid aluminium back bar and specify guide wires as standard; so that if there were any potential for the blind to swing around when in operation, the optional side guide wires enable the blind to run on two very discreet cables either side of the blind which effectively puts the blind under tension and prevents any potential hazards, for example in a hairdressers where outside doors are opening. The blind is operated by a 1000mm chrome metal chain. Motorisation is possible for this blind type on an integrated battery or hardwired solution. Transparent pvc resin film with a low thermal conductivity, uv resistance tested for 1000 hours of sun exposure with high flexibility. Produced according to the european product regulations concerning dangerous chemical substances as regulation 1907/2006 named reach. The transparent pvc can simply be washed with soap and water to keep it clear from germs, and clean to see through! **for orders over 100 units, we can offer a chargeable nationwide fitting service installed within 5-7 working days - please contact customer services should you have this type of enquiry and we will be happy to help** please do let us know if you have any specific questions about this transparent clear plastic roller blind and we will be more than happy to help you further. Discover their plastic clear roller blind here. Please let us know if you have any questions and we will be more than happy to help you further.
